title: AERO FIGHTERS
description: AERO FIGHTERS is a fighting adventure game with a vertical scroll scrolling system. It offers two main modes, single-player and two players. Also, some other customizations are given, such as level, sound, joystick, … There are four levels for matches that are easy, normal, hard, and super hard. You can join one of four countries: the USA, Japan, Sweden, UK. For each nationality, you will be able to fly a private plane. There are challenges taking place at different locations. You will control your plane to fight with many enemies from above, below, and both sides. You will need to avoid the shells they drop and not hit them. A Phaamt with a P will drop when you defeat an enemy, and it will help you increase the number of bullets and damage. Each stage has a boss name. Your task is to defeat this boss to the next stage. When hit by enemy bullets, your life will be reduced, and the bullet effect will decrease. Occasionally, sudden battles will occur that prevent you from responding. Therefore, you need to be focused, so you don’t die soon. Your main task is to destroy the enemy base.

title: ALADDIN
description: Disney’s Aladdin movie is no stranger to us all. Now, Capcom has bought the copyright to adapt into a popular game called ALADDIN. This is a side-scrolling platform action game from left to right. The game camera will only move the rotation angle in the direction of Aladdin’s movement. There are several stages taking place in the game at different locations throughout the city of Agrabah. There are many challenges posed in stages. Aladdin’s main method of fighting is to jump on opponents, use apples as weapons to throw them. During the move, Aladdin can pick up various items like apples, diamonds,… Collecting diamonds will give you more lives, and your score will increase significantly. Besides, each stage has a scarab hidden in a treasure chest. When you catch it, the door of the reward round will open, giving you a chance to add lives or some special rewards. Encountering enemies is indispensable in every stage. You need to defeat them before you can take them out. With each hit, Aladdin’s life will be reduced, and the period will end when Aladdin will completely lose his life.

title: ALIEN VS. PREDATOR
description: This is a fighting game created with the background of the movie of the same name. It is set in Shanghai on the planet Vega4 at 2493. Here, the aliens are plotting to invade the city and endanger the people. The game offers two main modes: single-player mode and a multiplayer mode with up to 3 people. There are four types of characters you can control: two Cyborg soldiers, Major Schaefer and Lieutenant Linn Kurosawa, two predators, a hunter, and a warrior. Each character has their physical characteristics, combat skills, and weapons. Some characters that use weapons have gained from the enemy. In addition to close-range or melee weapons, they are also equipped with long-range weapons. Destroying some enemies will cause you to receive some items such as skulls or light balls,… Eating a light ball will help you to be invisible and fight when your opponent cannot see you. Each character has two bars, a health bar, and an energy bar. Every time you fight, your energy bar will be reduced, and you need to wait for energy to recover or eat energy boost items to continue fighting. Battles will take place at various locations.

title: ASTERIX & OBELIX
description: ASTERIX & OBELIX is a platform game based on the famous animated film The Vikings. There are two main game modes offered, single and multiplayer, with up to two players. The only two characters that can be controlled in this game are ASTERIX and OBELIX. The game has a side-scrolling system. There are many locations taking place in the game are England, Switzerland, Grecia, Egypt, Hispania… At each stage, you must fight the enemy during the move. You can see them appearing in front, behind or above, and they can also hide in the bushes. Also, killing some wildlife will help you gain more food. Collecting money during the move is indispensable. You can also destroy the ladder to get money and items. Some locations are contiguous lands. However, others are separated by the sea, so you will need to cross the sea to reach the next location. The main skill of the character is to turn and fight. The amount of money in each game is predefined, and you need to earn them to move to the next location. In the process of moving, many serious difficulties, Arabian traps will appear. You can also select terrain features that give you an advantage.

title: ActRaiser 2
description: Act Raiser 2 is a platform game released for SNES. It has a plot that is not very relevant to the previous version but still contains concepts drawn from religious epics. The game only offers a single-player mode with platform actions that scroll from left to right. The main character of the game is a Master, and this is a god specializing in controlling floating palaces and monitoring the lives of people. Knowing that the people below the Earth were in danger and being possessed by demons, the Master descended upon the Earth to fight the false devils and drive them away. There are many dangerous lands you need to go through. In each of these lands, two types of youkai will appear. One example is the relatively weak little demons, which appear right from the start. The one born of evil is more dangerous; they are taken after you have killed all the little devils. The Master only has two primary weapons: a sword and a shield with the most commonly used moves, flying, jumping. However, this physical power is weak, so the Master often uses his magic power. Each region, the Master will use different magic with its energy characteristics. Location characteristics limit most magic.

title: Aero the Acro-Bat 2
description: This is a platform game released by Sunsoft. It was created to commemorate the famous Brazilian driver, Ayton Senna. He died after a car accident in the Grand Prix season. The game has a plot revolving around Aero, Edgar Ektor, Zero, Kamikaze Squirrel. After knocking Ektor out of the tallest tower of the Museum of Terror, Aero continued to explore Ektor’s furniture museum and a magic box that took him to an old castle. Here, Aero was helped by Edgar Ektor, Zero, Kamikaze Squirrel’s minions, as well as revealing secrets to him without knowing that Aero’s goal was to destroy them. The game gives you eight world environments, each of which has three levels except for the last one. Many secret areas appear in the game. In this game, you will not have the goal of fighting with a certain number of characters or enemies, and you only need to find a way out for each mission. Quests that do not require completion in a given time. On the way, encountering enemies is inevitable. You will have to defeat them to move on and collect power items along the way. The primary weapon Aero uses is the drill with many functions

title: Alien 3
description: The game has an action platform with a side-scrolling combat system. Joining the game, you will control Ellen Ripley, a human character moving through the colony of Fiorina Prison 161. The main activities of the player are jumping, shooting, climbing, crawling, opening doors, using vehicles. In addition, players have an arsenal of diverse genres, such as pulse rifles, flamethrowers, grenades, and a monitor that warning danger whenever enemies come near. Initially, the target will be selected, and all layouts are designed according to that goal. The specific objective of the game is to prevent aliens from entering the prison and rescue prisoners. In the process of moving, you will encounter many animals, and you need to destroy them before they kill you. After being shot, they can revive in the old place after a specific time. Moving around the prison basement helps you find prisoners and rescue them by touching them. Each level has a limited time. When the time is up, and you have not completed the mission, you will die and have to challenge the scale from the beginning. There are six stages given, including the password for each step. The steam will end after the battle between Ellen and the alien queen.

title: Animaniacs
description: Konami continued to launch a game consisting of many sub-games based on the hit cartoon of the same name. It has a plot revolving around Warner Siblings, Yakko, Wakko, and Dot trilogy. In this version, students are responsible for finding 24 pages of Warner Bros. scripts that Brain had stolen. Brain took the script to plot to conquer the world. Another mission of the three brothers is to prevent his conspiracy. Join the game, and you will control the character through a three-dimensional playground. The characters will move around the Warner Siblings’ studio. You can complete the game without collecting full 24-page scripts. This game will focus on the stages of visual scenes and film genres. You will be allowed to control all three characters in the game at the same time. These characters have immortal vitality when there is no calculation of life or health bar. In addition to their immortality, they are just ordinary characters without power. The main characters move like running, picking up things, rushing away. In some cases, when a high-level item is needed, the three characters can be stacked. There is a slot machine at the bottom of the screen that shows how many people have earned and how many pages the script has found. On the way, players will encounter many different challenges.

title: Art Of Fighting
description: Art Of Fighting is a martial arts action game. The game modes provided are a one-person story mode, one-on-one mode against the computer, one-person mode with two players. Besides, before starting the game, you can also customize the difficulty level of the matches, see how to control the character, limit the playing time, how many rounds a game is, etc. The game will give you ten characters, and you only need to choose one character to compete. Each character has its characteristics, strength, fighting style, and techniques. But they all use the main technique is punch and kick. These moves will be combined with suitable movement methods. There is also a technique to attack the opponent’s spirit that is mocking tactics. It will make the opponent’s mental measure less. In addition to the main mission, the game also provides extra rounds. Winning these rounds, players will learn a new attack called the super attack. When you’re almost out of the blood and about to lose to a place where you can perform a desperate attack to get it to eat, then fall to 0. The game has relatively nice graphics, especially the feature of enlarging image details when two characters come close to each other is very appreciated.

title: Axelay (FastROM)
description: This planet was once a quiet, peaceful place to live, until…they came…

title: Batman Forever
description: Do you know and admire Batman superhero? If the answer is no, you can try Batman Forever to learn more about this hero. If the answer is yes, this game is the choice for you. This is a fighting game. Joining into the game, you will play the role of one of two characters, Batman and Robin. Each character has its characteristics and strength. In addition, they own a variety of weapons with characteristics of type, weight, speed. The game will provide you with modes such as a normal game, single-player or two-player mode, control methods, … With single-player mode, you will play one of the two characters and participate in the battle in stages. Many different battle locations will appear. Comes with them are many types of private enemies. The moves that the character uses are modeled similar to the powers of the original character. As for the two-player mode, you will control one character, and the other character will be controlled by your companion or AI. The game will give you some utilities on each level.

title: Batman Returns
description: Konami joined the race for adapted games with a new game called Batman Returns. The game follows the scrolling system from left to right. You will control the character from its original position and move in a direction from left to right. The game only offers single-player mode so you will only control a single character, Batman. In addition, there are all seven scenes you will experience in this game with different battle locations: Gotham’s Plaza, streets in Gotham, abandoned buildings, circus, … Each scene consists of many different battle levels with increasing difficulty. Besides, each stage has a different boss, and Batman needs to defeat them to unlock the next segment. Not only that, the many ways of transport and combat aids are different for each stage. Along the way, Batman will meet many different enemies. Both have a blood scale. If this scale drops to zero, Batman will die. Some people will appear on Batman’s path and will not affect the match.

title: Battletoads-Double Dragon
description: This is an action game released for SNES. The game has a plot revolving around the evil conspiracies of the dark queen. She plans to rule the galaxy and has teamed up with the dark warrior to plot it together. Battletoads, a superhero who defeated her before, contacted good allies Billy and Jimmy Lee to ask them to help and stop the dark queen’s conspiracy. The game offers five characters that can play the role of Billy, Rash, Jimmy Lee, Zitz, Pimple. There are seven stages throughout the game with many different levels. You meet and fight with a boss that appears at the end of each stage. Win it to reach the next stage. Each battle phase takes place at a different location. The main moves used by the player are jumping, punching and kicking. Every time you hit an enemy, the player gets an extra 1000 points. In addition to the enemies encountered along the way, players need to avoid the traps in the location. Some items that increase power and restore life are collected during the move. The game offers two main game modes, single-player and multiplayer.

title: Beavis And Butt-Head
description: Beavis And Butt-Head is an action game created based on the animated film of the same name. It has a plot revolving around two characters, Beavis and Butt-Head. They don’t remember where the concert ticket was, and you need to help them find it. Search locations include schools, hospitals, roads, walls, etc. During the move, they will pick up some items such as money, guns, weapons … or some food to restore health, and the symbols add lives. Searching for clues everywhere is indispensable. During the move, you will encounter some troubles from the people on the road or maybe other objects on the way. Each location has many different levels. The game offers single-player and multiplayer modes. With a single-player mode, you can choose either Beavis or Butt-Head. Every move and damage is valid only for you, and the remaining character will follow. In multiplayer mode, players can play with their friends. Many side games also take place. Here, you will collect a lot of useful items.

title: Biker Mice From Mars
description: Konami continues to launch a new racing game is adapted from the animated film of the same name. You can play the role of one of the following characters is Thrott, Modo, Vinnie, Lawrence Limburger, Dr Karbunkle, Greas Pit. The game offers you two modes are single-player and multiplayer with up to two people. With single-player mode, you control a motorbike racing with AI-controlled drivers. And with multiplayer mode, you will race against another player. There are many races at various locations given. Initially, you can choose a motorbike with the accompanying character to play. The car is equipped with weapons and other features. Some special features will appear randomly for players to choose, including cash, inviolability, acceleration, an earthquake to prevent opponents. In each race, the winner will receive a prize, and the loser must replay the challenge from the beginning. With the money earned, you can upgrade equipment such as engines, tires, … and buy additional items such as food, armour and weapons at the garage. All you need to do is prepare for the best state to enter the track and defeat the opponent then become the champion.

title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon
description: I am Usagi Tsukino and in fact I am Sailor Moon. One of the five Sailor Soldiers, associated with the Silver Millennium of the Moon Kingdom. Our enemy is the Dark Kingdom. This kingdom is an evil kingdom that uses monsters to penetrate the spirit of human beings, in order to withdraw their energy. They try to capture the silver crystal with their great power to create chaos. The Earth risks being controlled by this evil energy. According to our information, their base is located on Point D of the Artic Circle. We cannot forgive the Dark Kingdom. We, the 5 Sailor Soldiers have to fight! Let’s go! In the name of the Moon, I will punish you.

title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon R
description: After their epic battle, the Sailor Guardians are called back to action when some new and powerful enemies appear! Ail and An are alien siblings bound to the mysterious energy-devouring Makai Tree. And the Black Moon Clan, led by Prince Demande, has the power to destroy all of future Crystal Tokyo! Things get complicated when a mysterious pink-haired girl falls from the sky, demands the Legendary Silver Crystal, and claims Mamoru for her own! Could there also be a new Sailor Guardian?

title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon: Another Story
description: In the future Crystal Tokyo, a small band of discontent citizens have come together to form an rebel team of Senshi called the Oppositio Senshi, who feel that the Sailor Senshi and the Silver Crystal are the source of all of Earth’s past battles. Together with a mysterious woman named Apsu, they desire to twist time and change the destiny of the Earth. In the present day, the Sailor Senshi are enjoying peace now that the Death Busters have been defeated. However, strange things begin happening in the city. Previously defeated Daimons, Droids and Youma appear throughout the city. A visit by Ryo Urawa reveals a cryptic statement that the past and future are being replaced. Rei sees strange apparitions in the fire, and then the four Inner Senshi, along with Chibiusa go missing. Sailor Moon meets up with Uranus, Neptune, and Saturn to go look for the missing Senshi.

title: Blackthorne
description: Blackthorne is a game based on the movie of the same name. The game begins with the caption of the plot. The planet Tuul in the game appeared a long time ago, but it did not exist in human knowledge. During this long period, it was ruled by a magician known to be blessed with all the knowledge called Thanos. He had two sons, and when it came to the end of his life, he did not know who he should choose as the new ruler. So, he turned himself into two stone light and darkness. His sons will choose one and rule their kingdom. Androth and the people respected the stone, but another brother, Ka’dra’suul, refused the inherited stone. Eventually, one side of the country developed, the other side was turned into a monster. An evil man in the Ka’dra country has taken control of the kingdom and sent troops to invade Androth’s Vlaros kingdom. To protect his son Kyle, Androth sent him to Earth. Twenty years later he became a famous mercenary and returned to Tuul to save his people and reclaim his throne from Sarlac. The game offers 17 levels with four different combat areas. The main weapon of the character is a shotgun.

title: Boogerman – A Pick And Flick Adventure
description: Unlike other superheroes in the world, the hero of the game is a naughty, noisy, farting man, named BOOGERMAN. He thinks he’s a hero, but he’s stupid, but his natural “stink” is very helpful. You will have an adventure in an unknown world to save the world, use your own sniper gun to destroy enemies, or with a strange type of bullets that only Boogerman owns is burp/fart, booger bullets. Whenever you want to fly on the screen anytime in the game, you need to press A + B + C or D = key combination to make Boogerman fly around the screen to collect symbols.  On-screen press: Up, down, left, right, C, B, A to choose any level. There are more than 20 different levels and especially the final boss level, for players to experience. Each level is a small puzzle, and to solve all these puzzles need to defeat the enemy on each level.  Players can use “fly away” with unlimited fuel (something that players can not do while playing adventure games with other common genres). You are his first choice to help him save the world before it is discharged to the toilet. Participate in a pick-or-flick race to unplug on Booger Meister and his filthy group of his minions.

title: Breath Of Fire
description:
Breath of Fire is a standard role-playing game, with a compelling storyline that will evoke the player’s instinct to conquer. It revolves around the character Ryu, a young boy who originated from the ancient dragon race. Since his birth, he has carried within himself a unique destiny to bring peace to the world. You will play the role of Ryu and search for the final destination. Of course, there are seven other teammates who will accompany him, but they will join the group at a specific time in the near future. Just like the main character, they also have special abilities to exploit. But only when appointed as a leader in a group of 4 can that capacity be clearly demonstrated. And this makes the game more enjoyable to utilize.
Fights occur quite often. They randomly happen whenever you encounter or walk through dark caves. If the player can win, the system will bring rewards that contain the experience and sometimes useful items. And if you do not like the choice of each action in each turn, due to its cumbersome progress, then use the Auto feature.

title: Breath Of Fire II
description: Breath Of Fire II is a role-playing game set 500 years after the time of the original game. It has a plot revolving around the character of Ryu Bateson, who became an orphan after the mysterious disappearance of the family. After the false accusations his friend suffered, he decided to journey to erase his name. The game has a two-way scrolling system in which you will control the character from the top-down perspective. This gives you an overview of the game. Characters will move primarily in towns and dungeons. In the process of moving, you will need to communicate with the other characters of the game to gain information and fight evil enemies to advance further in the game. This version has changed the map design compared to the previous version. In addition, a new feature has been added to alert the possibility of meeting monsters in an area. The game has a turn-based battle system. During the battle, you are allowed to enter commands for each character and assign battle positions to them. Members can use magic tricks or items to damage opponents. When you defeat all enemies in the match, your team wins. Two magician characters can fuse to create new powers.

title: Bugs Bunny – Rabbit Rampage
description: Bugs Bunny Rabbit Rampage is an action genre game. The title of the game originates from the famous Rabbit Rampage cartoon, and the protagonist of the movie is the Bugs Bunny – one of the most popular cartoon characters of the 20th century. Players control Bugs Bunny so that the rabbit fights the villains in the traditional Looney Tunes movie and eventually must confront the main villain of the story directly – Daffy Duck. Most of the levels in the game based on clips cut out from the short film Looney Tunes. The game also has characters like in the traditional movie that is Elmer Fudd, Marvin the Martian, Yosemite Sam, Tasmanian Devil, and Wile E. Coyote. The game has more than ten levels that players must pass. Through each level, there are many weapons that players can pick up, such as bombs, explosives, scones, tomatoes, etc. Different levels will have different contexts and different exit paths.  The level of snow forest is where Bugs fights Elmer Fudd and his hounds, as well as Gofers Goofy. Defeat Elmer by hitting his face with a cake and then plunging a rabbit hole. Or on another level, in a pub, Nasty Canasta is waiting for Bugs. To win, stick to him and jump on him many times. And the last level is to overcome the eternal enemy of Bugs – Daffy Duck. But it is also challenging to win because Daffy Duck is immortal, and using a shotgun can kill players in one blow.

title: Captain America and the Avengers
description: Captain Steven Grant “Steve” Rogers is a World War II veteran, a founding member of the Avengers, and the Earth’s first superhero.  Rogers joined the battle as a fighter after he freed Allied prisoners of war himself.  In addition to fighting generic enemies, players also face Klaw, Living Laser, Whirlwind, Sentinel, Wizard, Grim Reaper, Mandarin, The Juggernaut, Ultron, Crossbones assassins and finally Red Skull.  Red Skull is trying to conquer the world with a group of supervillains. He used a mind control machine to control all their actions under his power. In addition to the main character is superhero Captain America, players can choose to play one of the three members of Avengers: Iron Man, Hawkeye, or Vision. Each character will fight hand-to-hand with their enemies, using special long-range attacks, either a launch weapon (Captain America’s shield and Hawkeye’s arrow) or an energy beam (Ironman). With one jump, Captain America and Hawkeye can attack with a flying kick,  while Iron Man and Vision can attack by firing their beams of energy at a 45-degree angle. Other Avengers, including the Wasp, Quicksilver, Wonder Man, and Namor, the Sub-Mariner will only appear when collecting special powers. Those characters temporarily support the player’s character. Occasionally Iron Man and Vision can fly themselves to fight, while Captain America and Hawkeye use the plane.

title: Captain Commando
description:
Captain Commando is a fighting game and released by Capcon.
The game is set in a future city called Metro City. This place is full of criminals, and they always cause disorder orders. A superhero Captain Commando appears with three friends to defeat them and return peace to Earth and other planets. At the beginning of the game, you can choose the single-player or two-player mode. Customizations for the game are made, and here you can choose easy, normal or difficult levels for your battles. There are four characters that you can control are Mummy Commando, Captain Commando, Ninja Commando and Baby Commando. In single-player mode, you can only choose a character to fight. The match takes place in many different locations. Overcoming challenges in this location, you will unlock the next area. With each challenge, you will fight with different types of enemies. Initially, you only use melee moves, such as punching and kicking. You will receive more combat weapons when breaking some corrugated iron on the way. In addition, health supplements can be found in the same way.

title: Captain Tsubasa III: Koutei no Chousen
description: Captain Tsubasa III: Koutei no Chousen (“Kaiser’s Challenge”) is a soccer RPG based on the Captain Tsubasa manga and anime. It is the third game in the series, and the first for the Super Nintendo. As was the case with its forebears, Koutei no Chousen uses a semi-turn-based RPG format in which the player selects commands dependent on Addwhether or not they have possession of the ball. The game follows the story of the manga to some extent. Besides the obvious graphical upgrade moving from 8-bit to 16-bit, Koutei no Chousen now allows the player to see a map of the pitch to help them strategize.

title: Casper
description: Casper is a collection of 7 games in the action-adventure genre with the main storyline mostly based on the movie of the same name. First Windows / Macintosh, released in May 1996. As a fun game directed at children from 4-8 years of age, genre adventure novel visual form. There, players will follow the story through subtitles and choose a plot development direction. The second game is Super Nintendo Entertainment System; the player will control Casper to overcome obstacles and protect Kat Harvey. It is quite similar to other Casper games, but you cannot control Casper too far from Harvey. If you do not comply, she will immediately be kidnapped by the ghost of Carrigan, and you lose. In 3rd place, we have Super Famicom. You will mainly control Ket Harvey and protect Casper from the Carrigan Crittenden and Dibs. During the game, you must also pay attention to collect items to complete the mission. The fourth is the quartet Sega Saturn, 3DO, PlayStation, and Game Boy Color. This is the most appreciated quartet in the Casper collection, all developed based on the original storyline and the next part of the previous three-game series.

title: Chrono Trigger
description: Chrono Trigger Classic Kong is an interesting role-playing game.  The story of the game tells a group of adventurers traveling through time to prevent global disasters. Players will control the main character and his companions in the fictional two-dimensional world of the game. The main context of the game often includes many forests, cities, and different dungeons. Unlike traditional Japanese role-playing games, instead of appearing in random encounters, many enemies can be seen publicly on the field map or waiting to ambush your team. Players can contact enemies on the battlefield map to start a battle that occurs directly on the map rather than on a separate battle screen.  Players and enemies can use physical or magic attacks to hurt their targets in battle, and players can use items to heal or protect themselves. Each character and enemy has certain blood energy, successful attacks reduce the character’s blood, but the blood can be recovered with potions and magic. In battles, players can equip their characters with weapons, armor, helmets, and other special items such as increased attack power or defense against magic.  Items can be used both inside and outside the battle. Items and equipment can be purchased in shops or found on a map at the battle scene, usually in treasure chests. By exploring new areas and battling enemies, players will gradually level up.

title: Contra III – The Alien Wars
description: Contra games used to be the golden age that dominated the genre of scrolling shooting games and can not mention the best game series – Contra III – The Alien Wars. The context is about the evil alien forces of the Red Falcon that invaded Earth. This version has new modes such as motorcycle chasing or rocket riding, mode 7.  Play the role of Bill (single player mode) or Lance (two-player mode),  the rings are gunfights with aliens as well as dodging crazy traps along the way. Special weapons can be carried and transferred at any time, or the player locks the character’s mobility. This allows them to shoot in all eight possible directions (including downward and at angles) without moving or jumping.  Like previous versions, there are three levels: Easy, Normal and Difficult. Especially if the player completes the game in Easy or Normal mode, they will start at the first stage in the next difficulty level with the current weapon configuration, lives and score intact. Next to the difficult mode, the final boss will have an additional form that must be defeated when they escape the lair of aliens.

title: Contra Spirits
description: Contra Spirits, also known as Super Contra 3, was created by Ei-How Yang in 1995. Do you want to take on the role of the evil alien corrupted Rambo-style mercenaries?  Most actions come in the form of a standard gun mount, all with the free help of Mode 7 technology to provide some nice rotating effects.  The act of the game is always quick and furious, portrayed like a Hollywood movie in the 80s, with big episodes happening all the time. You will destructively control the robot, overcome the collapsing city and an earthquake rising from the ground, and then drive a giant car to fight.  Also, because of the limited power, the only weapons that can be collected are lasers and spray guns. The spray gun can only shoot in 3 opposite directions, and the laser only causes two normal damage shots, the smart bomb can only hold for a while. That’s why you have to try to focus your strength as well as your fighting skills. As with the original version, this time, the game was also divided into six regions. The first mode is similar to the previous version, and the second level begins to roll with the enemy, the third level continues to be applied in the tunnel, then the fourth, fifth, and last levels started a war of both strength and intellect, battle skills.

title: DRAGON BALL Z: ULTIME MENACE
description: Dragon Ball is one of the most popular Japanese comics and certainly the name Songoku is no stranger to many people. Based on the main story of Dragon Ball and creating some new details, the Super Butōden game series was born. DRAGON BALL Z – ULTIME MENACE- SNES is the third and final game in the series. With this version, a series of new characters have been added and some features have been improved over the previous version. KI bars are now replenished faster, which makes the speed of the game greatly speed up. Still set in the martial arts festival, players will choose a character and participate in the fight to defeat the computer AI. Each character will have a special ability and a different fighting style, for example, Songoku can use the attorney “Kame Kame Ha”, Krilin can use the “temple”, … But in general, To win, the character control skill is still the most important. Trying to combine reasonable attacks and defenses is the core of the game.

title: Dai-3-Ji Super Robot Taisen
description: Dai-3-Ji Super Robot Taisen (“3rd Super Robot Wars”) is the third game in Banpresto’s immense Super Robot Wars/Taisen series.Six months after the DC War (as chronicled in Super Robot Wars 2), the DC seems to be regaining their former combat strength thanks to the Zabi family. In response, the United Nations has decided to reorganize itself into the Earth Federation. The heroes of the last war are formed into a unit known as Londo Bell; however, the Earth Federation distrusts them due to their immense power, and provides them with as few resources as they can…

title: Desert Strike – Return To The Gulf
description: If you are bored with simple adventure games, intelligence,… and are looking for a highly entertaining game, then Desert Strike – Return To The Gulf is a great choice for you. Inspired by the Gulf War combined with simulating the conflict between poisons in the Middle East, the game will surely make you overwhelmed with the epic battle scene. Entering the game, you will control an AH-64 Apache helicopter. But space stops there; players will have to control the plane and use guns to destroy opponents, rescue hostages. Allowing players to participate from an isometric view, watching the battle from outside of the helicopter (instead of from the cockpit), is the unique feature of this version. A certain amount of armour will protect the aircraft, if the number of armour drops to zero, your fighter will explode, and the character will pay the cost of living. There are many types of weapons, but the character needs to choose the weapons that best suit the matches because weapons with a strong attack will not be able to carry much and vice versa.

title: Donkey Kong Country
description: DONKEY KONG COUNTRY (V1.2) is a game with millions of copies ranked third in the sales charts of SNES and is one of the best games of all time. It is a platform game that has content revolving around two characters, Donkey Kong and his grandson Diddy Kong. They try to take back the bananas that were stolen by King K. Rool and his Kremlings minions. Joining into the game, you will control one of these two characters and start the process of finding hoarded bananas. The main moving modes of the two characters are running, jumping and rolling. Each character has a unique character and strong points. Donkey Kong is strong in combat power, and Diddy is strong in speed and height every time he jumps. During the move, players can collect some items and meet enemies with different characteristics. Each enemy has a request to fight and defeat by their ways. Several other items on the road can be used as battle weapons. If hit by an enemy’s attack, the player loses a life, also known as Kong. When all Kongs are lost, the player must challenge from the beginning. In addition, the hard work of collecting 100 bananas will help you get an additional Kong.

title: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy’s Kong Quest
description: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy’s Kong Quest is an action role-playing game rated as more levels, more detailed graphics than the old version. This version has more than 50 levels with more missions (involving climbing, zip-line, horse-drawn carriage and swimming). In this version, there are two characters, Diddy and Dixie, for the player to choose, both with different characteristics and features. (For example, Diddy can pick up and throw boxes faster, while Dixie can rotate the ponytail to bob in a short time). On adventures, don’t forget to pick up cannons scattered everywhere to make weapons; Then press the A button to collect items as well as activate switches and vines. Also, at each level, some secrets can only be found by attacking groups. In addition, animals that act as vehicles are more diverse, such as a high-jumping snake, spitting spider, swordfish, and parrots. Winning the game is not easy; the increase of many dangers and enemies on a level makes it a challenge.  So, save extra lives by collecting bananas, taking balloons or collecting KONG letters.

title: Donkey Kong Country 2: Unveiled
description:
"K. Rool is back and imbued with new powers!"

"Those who unveil all the secrets are truly worthy of this quest…"

DKC2 Unveiled includes 8 all new worlds that each have their own theme and levels that all feature interesting new quirks.
The maximum percentage you can obtain is 102% if you can unveil each and every secret that Crocodile Isle has to offer.

title: Donkey Kong Country 3: Dixie Kong's Double Trouble!
description: Revisit Donkey Kong Island and join the Kong family for their latest adventure. The Kremlings have a mysterious new leader named KAOS and are up to their usual mischief, even capturing Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong. Now it's up to Dixie Kong and the newest Kong, a giant infant named Kiddy, to rescue the two missing apes.

title: Doom
description: If you are passionate about thrilling, violent games, and want to be a great gunman to win all opponents, then Doom is the perfect choice for you. Built on a horror plot, giddy games can startle you with scary images. Entering the game, you will become a soldier with the ability to use the highest gun, get the mission to the search space detention station, save those lucky to survive. Breaking into the prison is not easy; the character must deceive the attention of the gate guards. Entering the detention station, scary things can make players startled at any time will turn to appear. The game can catch your heart with images of corpses everywhere. Always remember your main task, find the survivors, they can be right above or below the corpses, you need to touch to check the heart rate (see if it is a living person). But besides that, the soldiers will take turns to patrol you to destroy them, not to catch them. Initially, the character only owns a shotgun and will gradually have more weapons when reaching higher levels.

title: Double Dragon V – The Shadow Falls
description: Double Dragon V – The Shadow Falls is a fighting, action, role-playing game developed by Leland Interactive Media. Unlike its predecessors, this version will fight head-to-head style. Throughout the game, you will transform into a handsome boxer fighting many different enemies as well as their gangs. Fighting is still based on the control of 8 directions (observation) and six attack buttons. The six attack buttons will be punches, kicks, and throws of varying strengths and weaknesses. “Special Overkill” (special attack) only appears when the character’s health is reduced to 10/100, but it does a great deal of damage to the enemy. Up to 4 game modes allow you to choose: Tournament Mode, Vs. Battle, Quest Mode, and Watch Mode. Tournament Mode, where the character will compete with a series of opponents controlled under the command of the computer Vs. The battle is a mode of two players competing against each other. Quest Mode or alternate mode, a series of matches will take place in turn according to the progress of the story. Watch Mode, where players set tactics for two characters to compete against each other.

title: Dragon Ball Z – Super Butoden
description: The game is the first part of the Butoden series with a storyline and characters based on the anime of the same name. The content of this section starts from Piccolo Jr. Saga to the end of Cell Games Saga. The game gives you a total of 13 role-playing characters, of which eight are already available and can select arbitrarily along with five other locking characters. In addition, there are several modes offered, such as practice mode, versus, tournament, story. Each mode has different characteristics and ways of playing. With practice mode, you will fight with a machine-controlled character. This is a good place for your training because the damage done by the opponent is disabled, and you can freely practice the moves and how to control the character. If you want to be an audience to watch a match, versus mode is your choice. Here you can both control the characters participating in the battle and watch the match controlled by the machine. With tournament mode, you are allowed to play with many other players in a tournament or can play against many AI-controlled by machines. In addition, the story mode contains relatively many stories for you to choose from.

title: Dragon Ball Z – Super Butoden 2
description: Dragon Ball Z – Super Butoden 2 is one of the most popular versions of the Butouden series with more powerful action and improved combat system. The plot revolves around the content of the Dragon Ball series and includes many other important events. This version has three main parts including story mode, one on one and Tenkaichi Budoukai and one tournament. In particular, the story mode is more appreciated with different characters and their own stories. One-on-one mode and Tenkaichi Budoukai are simpler, it works like a tournament, and the player’s goal is to win the championship (quite similar to the mode One tournament remaining).  There are many characters in the Dragon Ball series that appear in this version (however, fewer numbers than Dragon Ball Z – Super Butoden 1) and some more hidden characters, supercell characters (super saiya Gohan), new tricks are added. Although Goku is not the main character this time, the player can still choose and use, as well as unlock him. The graphics are not excellent, but they are better than the previous versions.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Hyper Dimension
description: DRAGON BALL Z – HYPER DIMENSION is an immersive fighting game with characters based on the anime of the same name. The game follows an existing storyline that takes place from Frieza Saga to Kid Buu Saga. Whether the character you choose loses in some battles, it doesn’t affect the game’s permanent progress. You can choose to immersive into the original characters in the story appear in the game. The game offers you modes: story mode, versus mode, tournament mode and practice. If you have never participated in similar games, you can choose a practice mode to practice your skills as well as how to control the characters’ skills. In versus mode, you will engage in a quick battle with a character controlled by AI or a default player. You can act as a match viewer between two characters controlled by machine AI. When you want to play with friends, you can choose the tournament mode. Because this mode allows up to 8 players to compete in a tournament and you can fight with characters selected by AI. Story mode gives you storylines are a cold saga, mobile saga, buu saga, Gohan experiments.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Super Goku Den: Totsugeki Hen
description: Dragon Ball Z: Super Goku Den: Totsugeki Hen (“Dragon Ball :Z Super Legend of Goku: Chapter of Assault”) is an action RPG based on the Dragon Ball Z manga and anime, though the events it depicts actually come from the precursor series Dragon Ball, prior to the appearance of other Saiyans. It tells the story of Son Goku from the start of his saga until the defeat of the demon Piccolo. The game splits its time between its story mode, during which the player has to answer some multiple choice questions that test their knowledge of the series, and an isometric combat mode where the player inputs techniques and tries to overwhelm their opponent via a rock-paper-scissors system.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Super Gokuu Den Kakusei Hen
description: Songoku has always been a nostalgic childhood for generations in many countries around the world. Super GokuDen Kakusei Hen – is one of the most successful series in exploiting the plot and Songoku character image on the SNES platform. Dragon Ball Z – Super Gokuu Den Kakusei Hen – is the second version of the series, with the plot focusing on the time Songoku and his Earth friends battle the evil Frieza. Since this is a visual novel game, there is almost nothing you need to do but follow the story through the subtitles and occasionally make some decisions to continue the game. Because the game is a SNES platform, the graphics are not polished. But in return, the plot of Dragon Ball Z – Super Gokuu Den Kakusei Hen is very attractive, and the voice acting, background music, combat sounds,… are extremely excellent. If you are a fan of Songoku in particular and the popular Dragon Ball series in general, then this will be a game that is hard to ignore.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Super Saiya Densetsu
description: Dragon Ball Z: Super Saiya Densetsu is an RPG and a combination of the previous two Famicom games of the Gokuden: Dragon Ball Z: Kyōshū series! Saiyan and Dragon Ball Z II: Gekishin Freeza, but there are no characters from the film and no extras in the animation. Characters included in the game include (in order): Goku, Piccolo, Gohan, Krillin, Yamcha, Tien Shinhan, Chiaotzu, Dende, two Namek warriors (Maima and Tsumuri), Vegeta, Nail and Captain Ginyu. The villains, enemies in the game include Blue, Orange, Green, Black, Purple / Cyan and Gray Saibamen. The battle system based on many symbols, numbers (indicated by dots), and the card itself. The player has a total of 5 cards (5 moves) for most situations, randomly generated. Players can use item cards like Oolong to exchange them, or King Yemma or Chi-Chi to maximize the card’s potential. Regular attack card: White card with school character. Strong attack card: Yellow card. Ginyu Attack Card: A black card with the Ginyu force symbol, it is the same as a normal attack card. Ki attack card: Green card. The number of stars on Dragon Ball on the top left shows attack power, and there are a total of eight power ranks. The character on the Dragon Ball symbol on the bottom right determines its defensive power. It also has eight ranks, with a single wavy line being the weakest defense and Z being the strongest.  If two offensive characters with equal power attack equal-strength enemies with cards of equal power and attack power, enemies with weak defensive power will receive more damage than one with a higher defense.

title: Dragon Quest I.II
description: This is a remake of two first Dragon Quest titles, the second version of both Dragon Quest and Dragon Quest II, preceding the Game Boy Color compilation of Dragon Warrior I & II. This remake includes updated graphics that retain the original look, sound of higher quality, and some changes in the gameplay and in the game world: certain locations are larger, some menu commands (such as “Stairs”) are omitted, and there is a larger variety of items. Though the two titles have since been separated for mobile phone releases, the changes implemented in the original Super Famicom bundle package have become permanent additions and improvements seen in every version of the games since.

title: Dragon Quest III
description: Dragon Warrior III is the concluding game of the first Dragon Quest/Dragon Warrior trilogy, and its story takes us back to the time period of the legendary Erdrick (also known as Loto), the ancestor of the first game’s hero. You are the son of a powerful warrior Ortega, skillful in physical combat and spellcasting. Your father went out to fight the evil Baramos, who is responsible for the appearance of monsters in your region, and never returned. You are sent by the king on a quest to continue your father’s brave deeds and to defeat Baramos.

title: Dragon – The Bruce Lee Story
description: Dragon – The Bruce Lee Story is a martial arts simulation game about the legendary Bruce Lee actor and martial artist. Not to mention the plot, the game has been appreciated for having the graphics of the first-class SNES system. The plot of the game mainly revolves around the events of contemporary actor Bruce Lee. In this legend, the player will turn to play with each corresponding opponent (in some high difficulty levels, the competition must be played with two people at the same time). In addition to the basic attacks available, the character also has an additional energy bar, which, to a certain extent, can switch to Fighter mode (type speed) or Nunchaku (using nunchaku). In terms of difficulty, in general, Dragon – The Bruce Lee Story is quite difficult, especially the game with two opponents at the same time or with the bosses. Therefore, when fighting, you have to be careful, try to dominate in the attacks as well as pass through the opponent carefully to find the appropriate fighting style. As for the sound to say is very good, great compatibility with each scene, happenings of the match. If you are a martial arts enthusiast in general and Bruce in particular, Dragon – The Bruce Lee Story is a game not to be missed.

title: E.V.O. SEARCH FOR EDEN
description: Derived from a legendary line about the evolution of life on Earth, E.V.O. SEARCH FOR EDEN – platformer action game has been released. The game is a journey throughout more than 1 billion years of history, which will take players through each stage of evolution of all creatures on Earth. At the beginning of the game, you will become a fish, travel across the planet defeating all enemies and slowly evolve into an immortal step to the realms with Gaia – the daughter of the sun king (the embassy of immortality). The game is divided into five game modes corresponding to 5 stages in the history of Cambrian, Ordovician, Mesozoic Era (Dinosaur Age), Neogene (Ice Age), and finally, the Quaternary period. Each mode will have many different maps, destroy all enemies here, and you will receive “evolution points” to help upgrade body parts, change in appearance. The attack is also quite a simple for when a character just bites, stab them (with horns), fly up (to avoid the onslaught of them)… With straightforward gameplay, sure E.V.O. SEARCH FOR EDEN will be a game suitable for all gamers of all ages.

title: EARTHBOUND
description: EARTHBOUND is an RPG game developed by Ape Inc and HAL Laboratory. Built on the style of Western culture, EARTHBOUND seems to break the tradition, the gameplay of the same genre games. Entering the game, you will control a group of characters passing through villages, cities, caves, … in two-dimensional worlds. Along the way, the character will have to fight against all enemies; if frank, the whole group will receive experience points. If there are enough experience points, the level of each character as well as the whole group will be increased. Instead of using the maps like most console role-playing games, this version establishes a “straight” world (the character can only go straight ahead). Another difference that makes the brand of this version is that it allows players to use oblique angles. While most games of the same genre only allow viewing under the “top-down” or isometric view. These “random encounters” are no longer in the middle in this version, but instead, battles will only take place when your character is in direct physical contact with the enemy.

title: EARTHWORM JIM
description: EARTHWORM JIM is a game based on the shooting and running platform that was released in 1994, which has attracted a lot of attention from gamers. Entering the game, you will take on the role of Jim – a talented bounty poem, after hearing the princess was kidnapped, the queen decreed a big reward for anyone who could rescue the princess. In the form of a worm, dodging obstacles on the road will be easier for the character. Built under the 2D platform with running and shooting elements, EARTHWORM JIM promises to bring you a great experience. The opponent can use a gun to destroy the enemy, besides can also use the whip to strike directly down the opponent. However, the use of the whip will not be easy when the character holds on to just hit the opponent with strings. At the end of each level, you usually ended with a boss battle with many heavy thru opponents like Psy – Crow,… In the middle of each level of play will be the Andy Asteroids, winning in the Andy Asteroids characters will collect a lot of items and unlock the level of secret. If you fail, a boss battle will appear.

title: Earthworm Jim 2
description: Following the success of Earthworm Jim, Shiny Entertainment has launched Earthworm Jim 2 as a new gift for fans of the game. As an improved and upgraded version, adding many new features, Earthworm Jim 2 promises to continue the success of its predecessor. The plot remains the same as in the first version, when the character’s mission is still to rescue the princess, missing a large sum of money for her own. The game is built based on platformer gameplay, running, and shooting combined with adventure, action, and gameplay elements. The levels in this release have been expanded (Level 8 appears “Level Ate”). One of the most obvious changes compared to its predecessor is the appearance of automatic guns, “Barn Blaster” guns on the move. A companion of Jim, Snot, is also added. Snot can only move based on swinging motions on green surfaces. Victory will be counted if the player kills all opponents and takes Snot to the finish line. Regarding graphics, this version is highly appreciated when it has been focused on design, color coordination.

title: F-ZERO
description: F-ZERO is a tough racing game, released by Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The game earned a huge buzz thanks to the attractive extras and racing speed that not all versions have. Super Nintendo Entertainment System is the first version developed based on the “Mode 7 Scrolling” technology combined with 3D environment simulation, promising to bring you a great experience. Fifteen challenging courses require you to pass one by one. There are four cars with strengths and weaknesses, suitable for each terrain, and the riders need to consider to choose. In every match, not only racing, but riders also have to use their techniques to overcome obstacles as well as mines that are already set. Besides, the game requires you to memorize the map and quick reflexes to be able to pass the bends safely. High-speed racing gameplay combined with having to find shortcuts (shortening the track, avoiding the most obstacles) is the difference in gameplay that appeals to this version.

title: FIFA Soccer 96
description: If you are a fan of the match, becoming a talented player is your dream, FIFA Soccer 96 is the perfect choice for you. FIFA Soccer 96 is the third version of the FIFA series and is also the first in the 3D graphics series to be released on SNES and Genesis platforms. The upgraded game focuses on developing authenticity in each match. The scene of the players is upgraded extremely honestly, and details to the wall lines will surely satisfy every player. There will be no more controversial balls like the games in the same line; this version has been upgraded on the ability to handle situations in (increasing artificial intelligence for the character). But the effects of ball transmission, dribbling, volley, corner, etc. are also invested in designing. The players are upgraded, can hit the ball, the percentage of shots on the opponent’s goal is also increased. Besides, the sound in this version is also extremely praiseworthy when the soundtrack has been added suitable for the fight situations. The cheers when the ball is scored are also very lively and true.

title: Fatal Fury
description: Fatal Fury a fighting game, violent tactics that attract the attention of many gamers. The game revolves around a system of the tournament “King of Fighters” held in the city of South Town fiction in America, under the aegis of the notorious crime boss Howard Geere. Ten years ago, due to an incident during the tournament, Jeff Bogard died, in retaliation for his late father Andy and Terry joined the tournament against Geese – whom they allegedly murdered his father. Entering the game, you will play Geere – a talented, experienced player. Following the gameplay as in the games of the same genre, Fatal Fury is still the direct competition of players against opponents on a certain stage. The character controls will be based on a system of 8 directional control buttons (front, back, top, bottom, right, left, right and left diagonal) and three attack buttons: punch, kick, throw. Each character will have a special skill set based on the combination of buttons on the player’s keyboard. In addition to mode one vs. one, this version has added a community mode that allows you to compete with your friends.

title: Fatal Fury 2
description: After the success of Fatal Fury, SNK decided to give one more gift to its fans, so Fatal Fury 2 was released. The plot based on the first part, after Geese Howard’s death, the “King Of Fighters” tournament continues with the help of another sponsor. This time, the matches in the tournament system will be more difficult and fierce, requiring the players to be extremely focused, ignoring a few seconds that can cost the whole life. Players can attack by controlling the four buttons of Light Punch, Light Kick, Strong Punch and Strong Kick. “Professional” attack techniques added and upgraded. Especially after the players are attacked, they can quickly counterattack with a unique technique called “Evasion Attack”. In addition, after winning the player can “mock” the opponent using the String Punch button twice. This version is highly appreciated with sharp iron graphics system, meticulously designed characters, beautiful attack effects, … About the sound is also quite praiseworthy when it has added a lot of background music to suit each situation in the battle.

title: Final Fantasy II
description: Following the success of the Final Fantasy series, developer Squaresoft continued to release part two with a series of system improvements and some new features. More specifically, the character development direction of Final Fantasy II is completely new compared to the previous version. Now, the power of characters no longer uses a level system based on experience, but they rely on the character’s fighting method. In simpler terms, players should use a fixed weapon for their character to help them become adept, from which the physical strength also increases by the system itself. Similarly, characters that use magic also increase their power according to their proficiency when using magic. Each match can only have a maximum of 4 characters. As a strategy game genre, in addition to strengthening the character, you must focus on learning tactics to maximize the win rate in the game screen. With the virtual currency system in the game, you can buy some additional equipment to support combat (should only be used when the game is too difficult) and stronger characters.

title: Final Fantasy IV
description: Following the success of previous versions, Square Enix continued to release a new version of Final Fantasy called Final Fantasy IV. The game is set in the medieval period with the plot revolving around the character of Cecil, a dark knight. At this time, an evil sorcerer named Golbez is plotting to capture the crystals of power and use it to destroy the world. Instead of just role-playing and controlling a character, in this game, you will try to control a cast of characters. Many tasks will be given, and you need to complete all of them. Many battle terrains are provided: towers, caves, forests… Players will need to control the characters move and fight with enemies on a current field level. There is a world map provided to help viewers have a better overview of the tasks. Motels and shops are scattered in towns, and you can come here to buy the necessary equipment or additional strength. The game also debuted the feature of controlling five characters at a time in the same match. When fighting, players can use their magic as well as items or change the battle position for the characters, …

title: Final Fantasy V
description: The Elemental Crystals…the life source of the planet. With them, gentle winds blow, the seas are active, fire burns bright, and the earth is full of life. All seems well in the world, until the wind suddenly stops, the sea begin to grow stagnant, the heat of fire becomes scarce, and the earth begins to wither. King Tycoon, sensing a premonition of evil, hurries off to check on the Wind Crystal, only to witness it destroy itself. Meanwhile, a young traveler named Butz is camping in a field when a giant meteor strikes the planet. When he heads out to examine the meteor, he is shocked to find a young girl named Lenna, who is the princess of Tycoon, and a old man named Galuf, who is on a critical mission. Later, joined by Faris, a pirate captain, the foursome must travel the land in search of the destructor of the Crystals, and save the planet at any cost! Final Fantasy V featured many new gameplay options and tactics, including an improved Job/Ability system (like in Final Fantasy Tactics), the return of the ATB (Active Time Battle) turn system, and all of the classic FF gameplay you’ve come to know and love! Final Fantasy V was released as a stand-alone game in Japan, and again in Final Fantasy Collection. Its U.S. debut was as part of Final Fantasy Anthology. It was also later ported to the Gameboy Advance, adding 4 new Jobs, a new 30-floor dungeon, a bestiary, a music player, the ability to quick save anywhere, a few extra pieces of equipment, and a newly update translation.

title: Final Fantasy VI
description: Final Fantasy VI is the second instalment in the Final Fantasy series. With many improvements and new features, the game has gradually overcome the errors of the previous versions and promises to give players an exciting experience. The game revolves around the conflict between the Empire empire and the Ruturners – a tyrannical rebel group. Emoire gradually built an army successfully through the experiments of the Esper to summon the legendary gods. The Returners are seeking a magical power that is capable of opposing the Empire. Entering the game, you will engage in seemingly endless battles. In this version, the game offers two main game modes: Overworld and field map. Overworld mode is where you use the “mini-map” to observe enemy positions and plan to attack them. And Field Map is a mode that allows players to fight in dungeons or towns, thanks to the information that people provide side quests will be activated. To increase the power for themselves, players can learn magic (increase power index) or equip new modern weapons (increase power).

title: Final Fantasy: Mystic Quest
description: Final Fantasy – Mystic Quest is an action, strategy, role-playing game series with Final Fantasy that was released in 1992 by Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The game features action-adventure elements combined with random, unexpected touches. That will give players a lot of interesting experiences. Players will control Benjamin – a young warrior to save the world. With a plan to fully assemble all the stolen crystal pieces, the character moves to many lands to find crystal crystals. Like other games in the series, this version allows players to participate in the top-down view and interact with objects and humans (in the map). Unable to move freely around the map, characters are now only allowed to travel on the sealed roads. Some routes may be blocked (gray arrows appear); if you complete some tasks, you will have the key to unlock the route. Encounters are randomly occurring; enemies can appear singly or in groups on the map. During the battle, there are three deviations: fighting, running, and a defence that allow the player to choose freely.

title: Final Fight
description: The game is a fighting action genre launched by Capcom. It is set in a simulated city called Metro City. Joining into the game, you can control one of the characters: Mike Haggar (former mayor of the city or also known as a former professional wrestler), Cody (Mike’s daughter), Guy (you Cody’s body). Your mission is to rescue Haggar, Jessica’s daughter from the hands of Mad Gears Gang. The game consists of six stages and two additional bonus stages. Each stage takes place at various locations of Metro City. Each stage has many levels ranging from easy to difficult. Besides, each stage has a boss, and you need to defeat this guy to complete the stage. The game also offers you two game modes, single-player and multiplayer, with up to two players. Each character in the game has a different attribute and fighting style. The characters are not immortal, and they have their blood scale. This scale is also visible to enemies. When hit, this ladder will decrease points gradually. A scale reduced to 0 would be equal to an opponent that was defeated, or you died. The main basic moves of the characters are: hitting, jumping, throwing…

title: Final Fight 2
description: If you are bored with modern 3D graphics and want to “find your childhood”, Final Fight 2 is the perfect choice for you. A classic game with a clever combination of role-playing series with action style, recreating dramatic and exciting battles, Final Fight 2 promises to give players the best experience. Action style, fighting rolls scene still in the middle of the vow in this version. With two modes: 2 people and three people, the game creates its charm. Your purpose revolves around competing for power in the state of Mad Gear and rescuing his sister. Compared to its predecessor, only one character from Part 1 is revealed to be Mike Haggar, plus Carlos and Maki Genryusai will be released. The player who controls Carlos or Maki fights with enemies on the expansion of the Hong Kong arena, and each character has its own skills and abilities, so you need to consider choosing a character. Featuring 2-player combo mode, the game will require thorough use of tactics combining strength among you and your teammates.

title: Final Fight 3
description: The versions of Final Fight series are very loved by fans. So, Capcom has continued to launch a new version called Final Fight 3. The game set in the virtual city Metro City. Now, a new emerging gang called Skull Cross Gang has replaced the old Mad gang and is constantly storming the city. Guy, Haggar and a few new companions, Lucia and Dean, join forces to defeat the Skull Cross Gangs and restore peace to the city. These four characters are the main characters of this version, and you can control them to participate in battles. The game offers you two modes of single-player and multiplayer with up to two people. If you choose the single-player mode, you will control one character, and AI will control the remaining characters. And when you play in multiplayer mode, you control one character while your partner controls another, machine AI controls the other two. Like the previous versions, the characters in this version also own their own attributes and fighting skills. This version retains the same six stages as before, and each stage will have a unique boss. However, the plot of each stage will change compared to the previous versions.

title: Fire Emblem: Seisen no Keifu
description: Fire Emblem: Seisen no Keifu (Fire Emblem: Genealogy of Holy-War) is a Japanese Super Famicom tactical role-playing game developed by Intelligent Systems and published by Nintendo. It was released on May 14, 1996 in Japan. It is the fourth title in the Fire Emblem series, the second Fire Emblem title for the Super Famicom and was the last game produced by Gunpei Yokoi. The game has received recognition outside Japan through imports and console emulation, including an unofficial emulation fan translation into English.

title: Fire Emblem: Thracia 776
description: Thracia 776 continues the Fire Emblem story with a midquel or a “meanwhile” setting. The events transpire during Fire Emblem: Seisen no Keifu and the game contains many of the same characters from that game, while featuring cameos of many more. At its most simple the story is of Prince Leaf of Lenster’s struggle to free his native land from two forces, the Grandbell Empire and the Loptus religion. Features introduced into this part of the series include fog of war and night maps with limited vision, this requires characters to use torches and wands to light their way. Also the capture command which allowed enemies to be subdued and their weapons taken.

title: Front Mission
description: Set in 2090, the story of Front Mission revolves an Oceania Community Union (OCU) officer by the name of Roid Clive. An OCU squadron lead by Roid and Ryuji Sakata entered a special United States of the New Continent (USN) ammunition dump at the Larcus District on Huffman Island (a fictional Pacific island roughly the size of Oahu, “formed in 1995 from volcanic activity, east of the Pacific Ocean, south of Mexico’s west coast. The landmass was large enough to classify as an island in 2002 and all authority and proprietary rights was granted to the United Nations.”). Roid’s fiancee, Karen Meure, is already inside. However, the uneasy quiet is broken when a USN Wanzer squad led by an officer named Driscoll ambushes Meure on the premises. Driscoll himself kills her, setting the stage for the game’s first mission, called “The Larcus Incident.” After the player defeats the rest of the USN force, Driscoll escapes, but not before he detonates bombs inside the complex. The entire incident is pinned on Roid and Sakata, who are summarily dismissed from the OCU Ground Defense Force. The fiasco also broke a peace treaty between the OCU and USN, setting off the Second Huffman War. One year later, OCU Colonel Guri Olson seeks out Roid (who is a Wanzer fighter in the western town of Barinden) to work with the Canyon Crows mercenary unit. Roid joins after Olson dangles the prospect of killing the USN officer responsible for Karen’s death.

title: GOOF TROOP
description: The game is an action-adventure game with characters based on an animated set of the same name. The game offers you single-player and multi-player modes. Joining the game, and you will be able to choose one of two characters, Goofy and Max, to control. The game set in an island called Spoonerville.The game gives you five challenges at different locations on the island: on the beach, in a village surrounded by bad guys, an old haunted castle, a cave, pirate ship. Max and Goofy have different strengths and features. Max is more about speed, and Goofy is more about damage. Each stage will have many different levels with increasing difficulty. In each level, you need to avoid bad guys or fight them to go to the next level. During the move, you will pick up many different items. It could be some coconuts used to fight enemies or some other fruit complementary power. Collecting a sufficient amount of fruit ill help you add extra life. Besides, you can collect red and blue diamonds. With the two-player mode, when one of the two characters dies, it is still possible to revive and continue to play. However, if both characters die, they can not revive.

title: Ganbare Goemon 3: Shishi Juuroku Hyoue no Karakuri Manjigatame
description: Third title in the Ganbare Goemon series of platform/adventure games which cast you as the heroic Goemon as he attempts to save feudal Japan from all sorts of wacky evildoers. This time around, a time-travelling machine threatens all of Japan and thus Goemon and co. must jump into the future to stop the machine. The game alternates between a top-down world map view in which your characters explore the gameworld and side-scrolling stages in which the main action lies. As in most games of the series there are also loads of mini-games and unique gameplay sequences such as maneuvering Goemon’s giant mecha. The game continues the tradition of bizarre humor unique to the series, you can play as either Goemon or any of his 3 companions, Ebisumaru, Sasuke or Yae with each sporting unique weapons and abilities and also with their own dialogue options and cutscenes, which feature sitcom-like pre-recorded laughs for added wackiness.

title: Ghost Chaser Densei
description: Ghost Chaser Densei or Denjinmakai doesn’t take any dramatic departures from the standard scrolling-brawler plot-line. A city twenty minutes in the future must be saved from a terrorist organization, and between salvation and you is a long, straight line full of goons who must be punched. Aside from receiving orders from your boss before each level, and the quick conversation with a boss or rare NPC, the story won’t attempt to get in the way of beat-downs. There are three playable characters in the SNES version: the martial artist Makai, the mace wielding cat-girl Iyo, and the autonomous robot Belva. The Arcade version offers three additional characters: wrestler Tarukusu, beastman Zeldia and the purple haired Kurokishi and one extra stage called High way. Each has unique moves as well as the basic abilities of attacking, jumping, blocking, throwing, and using a special if attack and jump are pressed together. Unlike most brawlers these special moves deplete a recharging special bar, not your health. Makai can throw fireballs and do a flying kick in midair, Iyo can triangle jump and preform a spinning piledriver, and Belva can double jump and preform a grapple special. Characters also have a team up special if playing in two player mode. Enemies range from armored soldiers to lizard men to robots, but most break down into the same hierarchy: weaker types will rush at you while stronger types will shoot projectiles then rush at you. Each level ends with a unique boss with multiple short and long range attacks.

title: Gokujou Parodius
description: Overall, the gameplay is identical to that of its predecessor, Parodius! From Myth to Laughter, with several new characters to choose from. Also new, if you play a two-player game, the second player will have a different set of characters to select. They are clones of the first player characters, except with different names and slightly altered sprites or changed color palettes. These characters include: Vic Viper/Lord British, Pentaro/Hanako, Twinbee/Winbee, Takosuke/Belial, Hikaru/Akane, Mambo/Samba, Michael/Gabriel and Koitsu/Aitsu.

title: Gradius III
description: Konami continues to launch new parts of the Gradius series before the success of the previous versions. The game belongs to the role-playing fighting genre. Join Gradius III, and you will play the role of a pilot controlling an aeroplane named Vic Viper. The dark empire Bacterial is constantly invading galaxies, and this time, their purpose is the planet Gradius. Your mission is to prevent the attack of the Bacterial empire. To do this, you will need to control Vic to win all the confrontations between the two sides. The game gives you a total of ten levels with levels ranging from easy to difficult. There is a unique level of the 3D simulator and also was first launched in this version is level 4. Here, you will control the Vic Viper ship from the perspective of a third person. This version continues to maintain the same equipment as in previous versions. Besides, another new mode is added, that is the editing mode. With this mode, you can optionally combine the installation of given weapons into another hybrid weapon. The game uses a horizontal scrolling combat system with a display screen in the direction the character moves (left to right). The levels are not full of roses to help you easily win but filled with thorny looks. Therefore, you need to be familiar with the terrain of your team.

title: Harvest Moon
description: The game is known as an extremely popular ace of Natsume. It is a strategic role-playing game with content revolving around an agricultural town. Here, you will play a character and manage your farm. The game includes towns, plants, tools, characters, conspiracies, animals, festivals, unlocking and secrets, delivery, marriage, and ending. Initially, you will be immersed in a default character named Pete. He lives with his parents on a farm left by his grandfather. His dream is to bring the farm out of decline, marriage, childbirth, and living a happy life. Help Pete earn money to restore the vitality of the farmer. Initially, the farmland was filled with weeds and gravel. You need to pick and remove these things and then take care of the soil until you can plant trees here. The jobs that will help you earn money are selling vegetables, raising animals, expanding farms, …Mainly popular varieties are stapled crops such as beets, potatoes, tomatoes, corn, … When well cared for the tree, you get a bumper crop. You can bring them to sell for additional income. A very nice feature of the game is marriage. You will give gifts, flirt with girls in town and then marry one of them. Having children will take place, and life here will be described as a real life cycle.
publisher: JP: Pack-In-Video/ NA: Natsume/ EU: Nintendo

title: Holy Umbrella: Dondera no Mubou!!
description: In Holy Umbrella you control a schoolboy who lives in modern-day Japan. One day, the sky suddenly turns dark blue, a heavy rain falls onto the city, and the boy finds, halfway between his house and the school, an umbrella which seems to have fallen from the sky. What he does not know is that the umbrella is magical! The moment he touches it, he is transferred to a parallel universe. Immediately, he is attacked by a huge tank, but a strange old man with a talking bird saves him. It seems that an evil creature named Dondera is threatening the country with the terrible monsters she created. But is it really so? You visit the capital town, talk to the emperor, and decide to investigate the matter… Holy Umbrella is essentially a platform action game, but unlike most other games of this genre, it allows you to visit towns, where you control your hero in a standard RPG-like top-down fashion.
