The game is included by three different modes: Doubles mode, World Circuit mode and Singles mode. Singles is a solo mode where the player will play against another friend or another computer. Winning battles in this mode helps the character gain more experience points. Doubles mode where you will be paired with another friend or a computer, to challenge with a computer team or another team of players. To win in this mode will require characters and their teammates to combine to like the fighting techniques. Finally, the World Circuit, unlike in other modes, where the character will experience a series of consecutive matches. Firstly, the player will be scheduled to participate in a qualifying round if losing will not be able to participate in the next match and must play again from the beginning. However, if you win in this mode in addition to getting the champion, the character also receives a huge amount of bonus.

title: TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES – MUTANT WARRIORS
description: If you are a fan of Ninja Turtles, becoming a ninja to save the world is your dream, then TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES – MUTANT WARRIORS is a great choice for you. TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES – MUTANT WARRIORS has been upgraded and added many new features promising to bring players a series of exciting experiences. Entering the game, you will be selected 1 of 4 Ninja Turtle (Leonardo, Raphael, Michaelangelo and Donatello) to join the fight. The courts will revolve around cities with a series of high-rise buildings. The task of the player is to control his character jumping over buildings (not falling), collecting the gold coins that appear. However, be careful! Enemies and obstacles can appear at any time, and please avoid and destroy them in a reasonable and energy-saving way. Eliminating enemies will not be easy when you have to master the combination of punches, kicks and smears. The interesting thing is that in this version, the player will be able to adjust the difficulty of the matches, and you will set the speed of the game from the beginning.

title: THE LION KING
description: In the Pride of Africa, King Mufasa and Queen Sarabi gave birth to a lion named Simba. To train his son to be the successor of his throne, King Mufasa gave an extremely harsh training that required Simba to complete. Transformed into a lion Simpa (from an early age to adulthood), players will experience a myriad of tough challenges. As a child, you will control Simba as a human, destroying other enemies by jumping on them. Thinking like simple but not. This is an action that requires a high degree of precision from performing the jump. Simba also has a roar ability that stuns enemies who cannot move. Besides, you can destroy enemies by solving some riddles related to the plot. In the second half of the game, when Simba matures, the player will have control of Simba performing some offensive moves such as scratching, plugging,… opponents. However, be careful if Simba exhausted or fell into the Simba infinity hole will die, you will lose. Besides, to quickly recovering health, players can feed Simba some caught insects.

title: TOP GEAR
description: Becoming a great racer is your dream; owning the supercars that you design is what you dream of, TOP GEAR is the game that satisfies all your passion. As a racing game released by Kemco in 1992, TOP GEAR is highly regarded for its sharp, engaging graphics and addictive gameplay. Players will transform into a racer with the dream of becoming the world’s number one racer. Unlike other versions of the same genre, when you step the game, you will not be allowed to choose your racing car, but instead will choose the layout for your car. From the smallest details to the automatic gearbox or the use of manual transmissions are all for riders to choose and arrange. Throughout the race, the player will only need to control the car and shift (if using a manual transmission). Besides, riders are allowed to control “nitrous” which help speed up quickly in a short period. While the race will appear a lot of refuelling areas (if the vehicle lacks fuel can stop to replenish), If running out of fuel midway, the race will end, the player will fail.

title: TOP GEAR 2
description: Following the success of TOP GEAR, Kemco has launched TOP GEAR 2 to prove its heat once again. Maintaining the arcade-style gameplay as a series of games of the same genre, TOP GEAR 2 leaves an impression with more realistic graphics and sound levels. After the collision process during a battle, a breakdown of damage statistics will appear with which the vehicle’s mobility will be significantly reduced. Compared to its predecessor, the cars in this version have become more difficult to control, and the opponents also become better. Players need to finish the race in the top 10 to be able to continue participating in the next race game. Genesis ports – the refuelling port will still appear and perform the refuelling function in this mode. A small note for you: upgrading the car engine will help the car can accelerate faster, and mail can be controlled more easily. Besides the team with 62 ceramic songs from 16 different countries, the game has become a great version when successfully combining music with pain.

title: TOP GEAR 3000
description: TOP GEAR 3000 is the 3rd version and also the last version in TOP GEAR series released by Kemco. This is the complete version when it has overcome most of the bad points of its predecessors and added new, desirable features. TOP GEAR 3000 promises to continue the success of the previous two versions. Upgrade, expansion first to mention in this version is the “weapon” mode. This mode provides the team with a cobalt – titanium armour, polymer drawers, or other types of weapons that help pass the driver ahead without having to attack. With two modes of Championship and Versus, throughout the game, you can freely choose. Championship – where the world championships will take place. With a system of 48 tracks, players will have countless experiences for each race. Each racing team will be composed of 2 – 5 people; the winning prize in each match will be divided by each member. Versus – there will only be a maximum of 4 people per game. At the same time, in every different view. In this mode, vehicle colour will be predefined and not upgraded during joining mode.

title: TOY STORY
description: If you are a fan of role-playing adventure games, then you will certainly not be familiar with the games built on the plot of famous Disney versions. Entering the game, you will control the character Woody through many stages according to the whole story. The obstacles will appear one by one on the road, and the enemies may also suddenly appear. So players need to be extremely focused because just a moment of ignorance can cost the character with their lives. At first, the character Woody will only be equipped with a whip with a zipper, which helps the character can easily pin the opponent. Besides, if fighting is boring for you, the mini-game mode is a great solution. The mini-game where you will conduct searches in the maze, from the first perspective. Items that the character finds will help greatly to increase the power of offensive weapons, as well as increase the defensive power of the character’s armour. It can be said that this version is extremely successful in both graphics and sound. It has been invested in the design and colour combination harmoniously, along with the soundtrack that is extremely suitable for each situation.

title: Tales of Phantasia
description: In Tales of Phantasia, you play a young boy named Cless, who lives together with his parents in a quiet village. It was a day like all the others when Cless decided to go hunting with his best friend Chester. Chasing a wild boar, Cless discovered a strange talking tree in the forest who was pleading him for help. But as soon as it stopped speaking, the two friends heard the sound of an alarm. They returned to the village and found it burnt down, and all its inhabitants murdered. Before Cless’ mother died in his arms, she told him this terrible massacre had something to do with the pendant she and her husband gave Cless for his birthday… what connection could there be? Cless decides to visit his uncle who lives in another town, but he doesn’t realize his journey will take him to much more remote places than that! The game’s main claim to fame is its intro theme, which incorporates a vocal track. Normally, such a track cannot be done on the SNES, as all assets for a single song must fit into the 64kB audio buffer before the song can be played. This technical limit was overcome by slicing the vocal track into small samples and swapping them in and out of the audio buffer. The rest of the intro theme is standard MIDI. Tales of Phantasia presents a unique combat system. The battles have a lot in common with fighting games: you fight on a platform that slowly scrolls forward and have to attack your enemy in real time. Other party members are controlled by AI. You can pause the game at any time and use magic, items, or choose an overall strategy for your allies.

title: Taz-Mania
description: Taz-Mania is a role-playing adventure game, based on a story of the same name. The whole game will be a journey to search for a giant egg and explore the fictional land of Tazmania of Looney Tune’s boy. Entering the game, the character will select a map to explore; initially, only three maps will be unlocked (arbitrary selection), other maps will be unlocked after completing a few missions. The mission in each map is different but still aims to find the giant egg. On the way, Taz can jump or turn into tornadoes so he can eat more things. Besides, the rotation of the character also helps Taz easily defeat the enemy and save more energy. The mission in each map is different but still aims to find the giant egg. On the way, Taz can jump or turn into tornadoes so he can eat more things. Besides, the rotation of the character also helps Taz easily defeat the enemy and save more energy.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV – Turtles In Time
description: After the success with Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Konami continued to launch Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV – Turtles In Time, promising to bring players extremely new experiences. As in its predecessor in this version, the storyline is still based on the famous Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles animation. There will be two-player and four-player modes available to give players the freedom to choose. In the two-player version, you will be able to choose one of four Ninja: Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael (ranked in order of selection from left to right). Transformed into ninjas, players will move based on the movement of jumping around the streets and sewers in New York City. New features have also been added in this release. It is a character who can perform an attack by repeatedly fighting or stabbing all the Foot soldiers. To perform attacks, the player needs to move attack buttons, jump buttons or use a combination of keys (then the character will perform moves in succession). When successfully performing the high jump, slide, … will help the character’s attack more effective.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles – Tournament Fighters
description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles – Tournament Fighters is a fighting game based on the simulation of the series of the same name. Unlike the same series, this version was not released in Japan and also the last version released by Konami in Catch America. The story mode will allow the player to control one of the four Ninja Turtles (Leonardo, Raphael, Michaelangelo and Donatello). Each Ninja will have different techniques of punching, kicking, and jumping based on the actions provided by the player. A contest of four Ninjas will be held, and if when defeated three other Ninja Turtles, the character will continue to fight with Casey Jones, Hothead and finally Shredder. In addition to the Story mode, characters can join the Verus mode where players will fight another computer-controlled character or another player. The four-player mode will be a rotating battle, allowing you to customise the difficulty and speed of the matches. The four-player mode consists of three different matches, the first team to win two winning matches will be the champion team. To win in this mode is not easy because it also requires the mind, suitable for both you and the player.

title: Terminator 2 – Judgment Day
description: Terminator 2 – Judgment Day is the second version of the series of the same name manufactured by Midway Manufacturing. Set in Los Angeles in 2029, the war between human and destroyers is taking place very intensely. Players take on the role of a cyborg Robot – T -800 Terminator, pre-programmed to fight against Skynet, protecting John and Sarah Connor. The third perspective will help your character easily observe the opponent and launch the most accurate attacks. The game proceeds in 7 stages with seven different modes, but the difference is that it is impossible to choose the modes arbitrarily, must pass in turn (in the correct order). In the first mode, the character crosses a battlefield to places where refugees are hiding. The next mode revolves around the task of protecting refugees from other outside attackers. However, do not stop there; you must infiltrate the opponent’s headquarters to destroy the entire computer base system, the headquarters office that controls the evil robots to win the final victory.

title: Terranigma
description: The planet known to its inhabitants as Earth is composed out of two realms – the surface, or Lightside, and the underground world, or Darkside. Two cosmic forces, called God and Devil by the humans, were fighting each other fiercely until their final battle in Antarctica led to a catastrophe: the continents of the surface world submerged into the ocean, presumably eradicating all life on the Lightside.

title: Tetris Attack
description: If you are a fan of puzzle games, surely Tetris Attack is no stranger to you. As a highly regarded puzzle game about graphic style as well as experimental gameplay, Tetris Attack is sure to bring a great experience to the user. Throughout the game, your task will be to arrange blocks together quickly in a vertical or horizontal row to eliminate them. Any blocks of colour in the deleted lines (colour blocks) will fall. This can create a string effect when the falling blocks collide with each other. However, in this version, the new colour blocks will not appear by falling from the top anymore but will appear from the bottom up. If the coloured blocks touch the top of the screen, you will lose, the game is over. With an extremely diverse number of modes, players will have a lot of choices to experience. A story mode where you will fight against a series of tough opponents directly controlled by the computer. Endless mode, which is an unlimited time mode and only ends when the coloured blocks reach the top. Timer mode, winning will be calculated based on the number of points you scored in 2 minutes.

title: The Addams Family
description: The Addams Family is an action game based on the movie of the same name. It has a plot revolving around a wealthy family of Addams. However, they were imprisoned in the family mansion by their lawyers. Join the game, and you will play the character Gomez Addas. Your task is to find family members everywhere in the mansion. The game begins with Gomez standing in front of the mansion door. You will need to control the character to enter the mansion and explore every corner. Each member of his family is hidden at a different location. Whenever Gomez finds the red boxes marked with an A, he will get clues about where the members are locked. The order of members is not fixed, so the switch between tasks is up to you. During the search, you will encounter many enemies, and you defeat them by jumping over them. Several other items may also be provided to fight the enemy. This game only offers a single-player mode. Also, the password mode will allow you to continue playing at the position you are playing bad. Not only that, but some new games are also provided for Gomez to recover.

title: The Amazing Spider-Man: Lethal Foes
description: The Amazing Spider-Man: Lethal Foes is based on the Spider-Man cartoon of the time and pits Spider-Man against several of his old foes as well as an army of Spider-Slayers. Spider-Man can attack with a hand-to-hand combo or by shooting out pellets of webbing. He can crawl on any wall or ceiling and also swing along with his webbing strands if he has enough clearance. The story is told in dialogue scenes with the stage’s boss as well as Spider-Man’s allies at the end of each stage.

title: The Death and Return of Superman
description: After the success of the popular comic series “The Death of Superman”, to satisfy the passion of Superman fans, The Death and Return of Superman was released under the release of Sunsoft. It is a game that helps you turn into your favourite superhero character Superman fighting with a dark power to protect humanity’s peace. Characters can move in all directions, instead of just moving in one direction like the same line versions. The enemies will be set and appear only after the character annihilates the opponent. The appearance of the characters is different, but the short-range attack capabilities are the same: melee attack (punch), acrobatics, throwing,… If you want to attack long-range, you can use guns to perform attacks with bullets. The original Superman remains the ability to fly. This will help the character do not have to spend much effort to defeat the opponent and overcome obstacles (the character can fly over). Increasing the difficulty for the game, the appearance of the screen makes Superman can only fly and appear, opponents, obstacles in a hovering state.

title: The Great Battle IV
description: The fourth game in the greater Compati Hero Series which aims to combine the heroes and villains of Ultraman, Gundam and Kamen Rider in an SD format where everyone is at a uniform size. The Great Battle are the “core” Compati Hero Series games, presenting a standard side-scrolling 2D action game with shooter and platforming elements. Players can switch their playable character between the three protagonists from the series’ respective franchises at any point, and each has their own strengths and weaknesses.

title: The Incredible Hulk
description: The Incredible Hulk is a fighting action game released for SNES. The game revolves around the Hulk character, a character that is extremely familiar to everyone. Join The Incredible Hulk you will control this character. The game gives you five levels with different battle locations ranging from buildings in the city to alien regions. The characters you’ll be fighting against are the villains against the Marvel team including The Abomination, Rhino, Absorber, Tyrannus, leader). Each character will be a boss corresponding to one of five levels. Players will control Hulk characters fighting through all levels. During the battle, you will be able to collect various items such as super health medicine, tranquillisers, extra strength or more time for the status. These items are stored and will be brought to use as needed. A drug called a tranquilliser will help the Hulk transform back into Bruce Banner’s state. This status will be beneficial in small paths, but it will be harmful when you encounter enemies because, at this time, you will not have any power and only use a gun with two bullets. So when in Bruce Banner’s state, you need to avoid enemies to prevent being killed.

title: The King of Fighters 2000
description: The King of Fighters 2000 est un jeu de combat sans licence pour la SNES produit par DVS Electronic Co, et comme la plupart des autres titres non autorisées SNES, il a été distribué seulement dans les marchés d’Amérique du Sud. Il se présente comme une suite et se joue de facon similaire aux version précédente 98 et 99.

title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
description: LEGEND OF ZELDA, THE – A LINK TO THE PAST is an action-adventure game with a plot revolving around the character Link, and a young man is living with his uncle at Hyrule Castle. The player’s goal as the protagonist is to save Hyrule castle, defeat the dark lord Gannon and rescue Princess Zelda, the descendant of the seven sages. This version continues to use some features from previous versions such as wide-angle from the top, … and some other features and mechanisms. It also adds several innovations on items such as arrows, bombs,… Starting the game is a detailed narration that helps players understand the current situation of the character. When participating in the game, the scene will revolve around the Link character that you play. He will go to battle on various terrains equipped with a protective shield and a sword. At this point, the player will have three lives. The soldiers of the enemy exist everywhere in the castle and outside. Link will need to fight them. Some kills will cause items such as life, etc. If you get hit by an enemy, you will lose your life. Going deeper into the castle, you will meet stronger enemies. You will need to go to each room to find items as well as the princess. Rescuing the princess safely from the castle is an extremely urgent task.

title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past DX
description:
This is a collection of various gameplay improvements and bug fixes.

Improvements

All new, CD-quality soundtrack (MSU-1, higan/bsnes or SD2SNES only, requires separate download of soundtrack files)
Improved Pegasus boots, turn while running
Break pots with sword
Collect items with sword
Cancel flute transport
Death counter no longer increments when selecting “Save and Quit”
Use L/R to quickly switch between items
Slowdown reduced (FastROM)
Bugfixes

Kholdstare shell fade re-enabled
Mothula invincibility to L4 sword fixed
Glove palette when switching to map fixed
Shield palette when retrieved from pikit killed with ether fixed
Various flickering issues fixed
Cane of Somaria glitches fixed
Magic cape statue pulling glitch fixed

title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past – Redux
description: This is a romhack of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past. It changes lots of things including link’s and other characters sprites colors to resemble the original artwork. Renames several items like the ‘Flute’ to ‘Ocarina’ (it’s an Ocarina). Reverts censored graphics back from the JP release (Star of David, Skulls statues, Sanctuary doorway, etc). Increase max consumables (bombs, arrows) to 99.

title: The Lost Vikings
description: It's just another cool day of Nordic seafaring and pillaging when Erik the Swift, Baleog the Fierce and Olaf the Stout are suddenly sucked into an alien spaceship. And only you can help them find their way home. But each mysterious door you help them through throws them into different eras in time – and smack into new enemies! Will Baleog conquer Elmo the Dinosaur in Prehistoria? Will Olaf shield himself from the berserker mummies in the Great Pyramids of Egypt? And can Erik outrun the maniacal ripsaw in the Great Factory? Hurry! Only you can get these vanished Vikes out of the grasp of their alien captors and home through the chaotic arcade action!

title: The Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse
description: Mickey Mouse is probably the name associated with the childhood of so many young people. Based on the character associated with that childhood, Super Nintendo Entertainment System released The Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse. Entering the game, you will take on the role of Mickey Mouse, take an adventure to an unknown land. Arriving in a kingdom ruled by the cruel Pete, Mickey stole Pluto. With the help of a witch and his companions, Mickey decided to fight overthrow of the brutal regime Pete, freeing the people. Sprinkled with an outfit system with various fighting skills: magician costumes (allowing the use of magic), firefighters (providing the ability to spray water, climb)… Therefore, to be able to win in a battle, players must not only master the use of offensive and defensive techniques but also have to choose the appropriate battle costume. Besides, although the game supports a two-player mode, they will not be able to simultaneously. Still, only when one person’s character dies, the other person can control his character to continue fighting.

title: The Mask
description: Edge City – a thriving small city, where life seems to be happening at night. Suddenly Dorian Tyrell and his rogue gang are secretly planning or dominating this city. In this situation, the player will transform into Stanley Ipkiss – a banker with a moderate appearance, but gradually becomes a bloody character thanks to the strange green Loki. Throughout the game, the protagonist’s ultimate goal is to destroy the entire plan of Dorian and his gang. Starting with simple tasks like investigating apartments, banks, parks or even inside the prison will probably not make it difficult for you. After successfully gathering some important information, the character will meet and fight scary characters like Mrs Peenman, Burt Ripley,… In the fight, the tactics of The Mask (film) are also included in the game such as mallet, tornado, guns, horns,… Besides, some other special moves are also added such as “moves” sneaking “(helps you become invisible), some basic attacks with gloves, … or the use of powerful” Morph “was.

title: The Ren & Stimpy Show: Buckeroo$!
description:
Oh, hi kids! I'm so excited about my new invention – the Gametron 5000 Moneymaker. It pays you money for playing video games – the more you play, the more you make.

The first game is… let's see… Robin Hoek of Logwood Forest, where Robin robs from the rich, gives to the poor, and rescues the bea-u-ti-ful Maid Moron from atop yon castle… 

The next game is Out West, where Three-Fingered Hoek and his faithful sidesaddle, Stimpy the Kid (that's me!) make their way through a dangerous frontier town to find Mr. Horse and… uh… borrow him.

And that's not it – heavens, no! The final game is Space Madness. Oh my, Space Commander Hoek has come down with Space Madness, and his spaceship is going to smash into the Earth! Luckily brave Space Cadet Stimpy (that's me again!) is there to save the whole planet!

Oh Reeennnn… are you ready to make oodles of money? Money? Don't just stand there, man! Let's get playing!

title: The Ren & Stimpy Show: Veediots!
description:
Help! We're trapped in our own T.V. show! Stimpy and I, we can't take it anymore, man! We've decided to bust out of this two-bit tube and into the real world, but we need your help! It goes like this…

First, in The Boy Who Cried Rat, Stimpy is trying his hand at being a mousecatcher – and the mouse, of course, it is I in disguise! Man, I just hope that eediot doesn't eat me by mistake..

Then, In The Army, I'm behind enemy lines, and up to my earbones in all sorts of bad guys. Jeez! Who wrote this episode, anyway?

In Stimpy's Invention, that feline friend of mine is putting together something in his crazy laboratory. Hmm… looks like a hat…

Finally, in Marooned, Space Cadet Stimpy has gotten himself lost and digested in the furthest reaches of the galaxy! Deesgusting!

Oh, yeah, everyone else is trapped in here, too: Mister Horse, Space Cabbages, Muddy Mudskipper, and even Powdered Toast Man, man! So grab those controls and get us out of here!

title: Tiny Toons Adventures – Buster Busts Loose!
description: Tiny Toons Adventures – Buster Busts Loose! is a role-playing adventure game, released by Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1994. The game features an extraordinary Buster Bunny feature, which makes this version seem to have no plot. This means that there is no relationship between levels. In short, the game is like a diary with segments that are not consecutive. With three modes from easy, normal to challenging, it will help the character to experience exciting missions. Because the plot is different in the levels, the attack style and power of each opponent will be different. Therefore requires the character to change tactics so that they can be won flexibly. Victory at each level of the player usually the huge amount of gold, helping the character can pour a lot of costumes and new powers. To avoid the boredom of the game, mini-games have been added, and it can be as simple as finding food, stealing something, or admiring more teammates,… When completing the mini-game, the character will receive some decent experience points (help level up through the screen).

title: ULTIMATE MORTAL KOMBAT 3
description: ULTIMATE MORTAL KOMBAT 3 continues to be released after the success of the previous versions. The game belongs to the fighting action genre with some horror elements. The number of characters for the current version has been expanded to 24. In addition, many new moves have also been added, such as animal chemistry, combo attacks, combo moves have also increased the duration. Three game modes are single-player or also known as Mortal combat, four players 2 of 2 battle, and eight players in a tournament. With the single-player mode, you can choose a character from 24 given characters. Each character has different power characteristics and abilities. The physical attacks of the characters are the same, but the magic power or the weapon is different. Players will have to fight in turn with the remaining 24 characters. Each match has three rounds. Once you’ve won two of the three innings, you win and don’t need to play the third round. The two characters in the match have a blood scale. When this scale drops to zero, the character loses. Your style can transform into different shapes. Battles take place at various locations.

title: WWF RAW
description: WWF RAW is a professional wrestling simulation game from a professional perspective. The game based on the same name tv show. The game offers you 12 different wrestling hands. Each of them has different characteristics in appearance as well as fighting styles. This version has added many movements such as DDT, falls, reflexes. In addition, the features of the player, such as speed, strength, endurance, are physically balanced against each person’s weight. The game offers two main game modes, single-player and multiplayer. The principle of the game revolves around an energy meter. This watch appears on the heads of two characters as they engage in battle and pull together. You need to press the button repeatedly to suck the energy out of the opponent and move them towards you. When the difference in energy appears, you will be able to perform combat operations, and the more the gap will increase, the more powerful combat moves you will have. There are many season modes offered, such as fall, Brawl, tournament available, … Each sport will have its own competition rules. You need to follow the laws of the game to win the championship

title: WWF Royal Rumble
description: Boxing is a martial art of violent nature, with a long history of the establishment, attracting the attention of young people. Aware of this need, Super NES and Saga Genesis launched WWF Royal Rumble, a simulation game based on the World Wrestling Federation tournament. The graphics in this version are incredibly sharp and colourful like the previous version, besides new features are also added. The game impresses players from the first time to join with a special attack. Fists are only used by the players in the ring, and in addition to the arena, players can attack opponents with steel chairs. After defeating an opponent, the character can use legal tactics to attack that makes the opponent unable to stand up and win. A small tip for you to avoid losing when defeated, through the countdown of the time, the character can roll back and forth (wait for healing, continue playing). In addition to being allowed to use basic attacks such as splashing the body, dropping the knee, beating back, … Players can use their own movements (set by the player) to attack the opponent.

title: WWF Super Wrestlemania
description: This is a wrestling simulation game based on the tournament organized by the World Wrestling Federation. The game offers single-player and multiplayer modes. In single-player mode, you will be playing against the computer, while in two-player way, you will be playing against a default player. There is also another mode is one on one, survival series. There are three levels: easy, medium, hard. You choose one of 10 given characters to join the game. They differ in physical characteristics and general movements of professional wrestlers such as slams, suplexes, dropkicks, hip hips, elbow drops, … The matches take place with rules that are modeled on the actual rules. The game offers championship mode. Here, you choose a character and accept the challenge of all the remaining characters. When winning all those characters, you will be crowned champion. Each character has a blood gauge on their heads, every time it is hit, this bar will decrease. When hit by active attacks, health will deplete faster. When the amount of blood drops to zero, you have K.O. The game has relatively simple graphics; the way to move out of the character’s attack is not too flexible.

title: WWF WRESTLEMANIA – THE ARCADE GAME
description: WWF WRESTLEMANIA – THE ARCADE GAME is a boxing competition game attracting many gamers, released by Midway Manufacturing Co.Based on the same games like Mortal Kombat and NBA Jam, throughout the game is a series of the fast-paced match wins. Compared to other games in the same line, this version is invested in development with the top attack, extremely honest. The fluency of combining moves and attacks (especially in the nape of the opponent) helps the player quickly win. When the players are injured, “bleeding” is a unique feature added in this release. Two game modes allow you to choose from Intercontinental Championship and WWF Championship. In the Intercontinental Championship, players must win a series of 4 matches one vs 2 to compete in new areas. This mode means more practice than getting bonus points to climb the rank. The WWF Championship is a place where players take part in the WWF tournament system to become the best boxing player in this virtual boxing world.

title: Wild Guns
description: The game is in the action-battle genre, revolving around gunfights in the wild west and with science-fiction elements. It has a plot revolving around Annie and partner Clint, a bounty hunter. They were in the process of taking revenge on those who had caused the death of the Annie family. They are the only two playable characters in the game. You act as the third person to control one of the two characters and join the fight with the robots and the enemies. There are six levels, and each level consists of 2 stages with weak enemies and a boss. The two main modes of the game are single-player and multiplayer modes. These modes allow players to control either Annie or Clint to fight and compete with other players or AI to see who has the highest score. Joining the battle, you will manage the character fighting the robot, but remember to avoid enemy bullets in the back. The more enemies you kill, the more rewards and weapons you get. These weapons can be upgraded further in terms of speed and power. When hit by enemy bullets, you will lose your life and challenge the task from the beginning.

title: Wing Commander
description:
The Confederation have been at war with the Kilrathi for the past 20 years, and you're just now joining the Vega campaign. You're a 2nd Lieutenant just out of the Academy, with some good work under your belt. You're posted to Tiger's Claw, the flagship of the Confederation Fleet. Will you help the Confederation to victory, or go down in infamy?

Wing Commander is a space combat simulator interspersed with shipboard dialogs. Onboard the ship, you can save/load game, visit the bar to get the latest gossip, or go on to the next mission briefing, and the 3D space combat part.

The 3D space combat has you sitting in the cockpit, where you control the craft like roll, turn, up/down, afterburner, as well as fire guns and launch missiles. There are four different crafts on the Confed side, each with different flight characteristics and armament. You will have a wingman on each mission, and you should keep the wingman alive as the wingman will help you if you issue the right orders. You can also taunt the enemy. You'll be fighting several different types of enemy fighters and capital ships, and even combat a few Kilrathi aces.

When the mission is complete, land back onboard the ship and get ready for the next one. The campaign tree has both winning and losing paths.

title: Wizardry I-II-III: Story of Llylgamyn
description: Wizardry I•II•III: ~Story of Llylgamin~ is a remake of the first three Wizardry games: Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord, Wizardry: Knight of Diamonds – The Second Scenario, and Wizardry: Legacy of Llylgamyn – The Third Scenario. All three games are available for the first time for the Super Famicom in this compilation release. As in the original games, the player can create characters choosing from five races and eight classes, and level them up by exploring the maze and fighting monsters, finding and buying items in process. Monster graphics have been updated, and dungeons have been given textures, but the player can also opt for original graphics with wireframe dungeons. An auto-mapping feature has been added. The player can also transfer characters between the three scenarios. Though released only in Japan for the Super Famicom, the game can be played almost entirely in English by changing the corresponding settings in the option menu.

title: Wolverine – Adamantium Rage
description: Wolverine – Adamantium Rage is a fighting action game with science fiction elements. It has a plot revolving around Wolverine, who is searching for its past. One day, he received a strange transmission via computer with content to meet to discuss his history. Joining the game, you will control the character to the meeting place and rediscover his past. There are many places out there, and you need to pass these places to have clues to find the next one. Each location has different monsters and bosses. Besides, at each level, you will be required to kill a sufficient number of enemies within the specified time to be passed. If the time has passed and the enemy has not defeated yet, you will lose a life. Our main character has only one trick is a claw attack. But also, Wolverine possesses flexible movement movements. During battles, when Wolverine is hit, he will lose blood, but his health will recover over time because of the mutant nature of the body. The game only offers a single-player mode. Initially, the game will give you detailed information about the characters.

title: X-MEN – MUTANT APOCALYPSE
description: If you are a fan of the Marvel heroes squad, it’s impossible not to know the X-Men. X-MEN game – MUTANT APOCALYPSE bought the rights to the character from Marvel Comics and adapted it into a contest to satisfy the player. The game belongs to the action fighting genre. It only provides a single-player mode. In the game, you will control one of the 5 X-Men. Each superhero has its characteristics, fighting methods, and attributes. Many challenges are given, and you can change different characters to play in each trial. However, the five characters are connected to life together. The character’s life column will be calculated from the beginning of the game until the character dies. Even if you change attitudes every round, the pillar of life remains the same, not full again. On the way, you can collect items to help restore health. Players will go through five necessary and available stages. After that, passwords for the next steps will be provided for players to fight. Each segment will have an evil boss, and you need to be careful when fighting them.

title: ZOMBIES ATE MY NEIGHBORS
description: ZOMBIES ATE MY NEIGHBORS is a fighting action game with horror elements. Surely you’ve heard of the zombies that specialize in cannibalism in dramas. Now they are in the game. In the game, you will control one of the two main characters, Zeke and Julie. The zombies have landed in town, and they are extremely hungry for human flesh. Your mission is to rescue your neighbors from being eaten away. The game consists of 48 stages with many different battle locations such as suburbs, shopping malls, castles, pyramids, … Different enemies will appear in each step. All horror images related to demons are put into the game: vampires, werewolves, devil babies, spiders, squid, evil dolls, aliens, giant ants, giant worms,… The characters in the neighborhood are very diverse in age and occupation: teachers, babies, tourists, inspectors, soldiers, dogs, and cheerleading teams. At each level, you need to save the right number of people to open the door to the next stage. If your neighbor is killed or you die, the level is over. Some stages will have a time limit to save people. When it changes from morning to night, you will run out of opportunities to keep your neighbors. There are two game modes provided, single and multiplayer.
